attributes.title: To all my fellow trump supporters
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. I KNOW YOU WANT TO GET THE LATEST ON TRUMP NEWS SO THIS APP MAY SEEM LIKE A GOOD CHOICE BUT ITS NOT. AS SOON AS IT DOWNLOADED(which took forever by the way) ALL I GOT WAS MESSAGES AND PICTURES OF “GLIZZYS”. APPARENTLY NOW THERES SOMEONE COMING TO MY HOUSE CALLED THE “GLIZZY GLADIATOR” AND IM FEARING FOR MY LIFE. THE ONLY WAY TO GET RID OF OT IS TO GIVE THIS APP A 1 STAR REVIEW. MAY GOD BLESS YOUR SOULS BECAUSE I FEAR MY TIME IS NEARING ITS END.

attributes.title: Very Dangerous Do Not Attempt
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app I was told there would be things that would be wonderful to support our president✨ but upon downloading it, I could not open any other apps!! I tried and tried to open them but a random balding mans face pop up on the icons instead.😶😢I was appalled and only after a very long and horrible visit to my therapist did I realize that was my presidents face. I got into my car to drive away from the pain of seeing his face but As i was checking my rear view mirror cuz ✌️✨safety✨✌️a black SUV bearing, ”trump 2020” pulled up behind me. at first I was completely supportive but then I remembered the app🤭  I was NOT having it. I swerved left and right and did donuts and U-turns (which are illegal im so bad omg) just to avoid this SUV!! I could not avoid it though, only until after I found a dark ally that I was able to lose the SUV. I was so relieved that I didn't even worry when a weird stranger walked up to me asking if I downloaded THE app. With no time to think I immediately replied with yes. The strange man brought me into his alley way tea shop --which was so good by the way he let me call him Danny and we even exchanged numbers- ANYWAYS- He and some of his friends invited me to a rally to protest against this app✨✌️ which he derected. I was so dissapointed on mh president when i heard that during our protests he was bunkered in his whitehouse. I was so upset that i took danny and barron trump away to an island in iceland and we lived happily ever after with the best tea and the best roblox player ever

~

attributes.title: Attacked
attributes.review: I had to download this app to support their president (cause he’s not mine🤷🏾‍♀️) But when I downloaded it atrocious things began to happen😱😱😱. It started with the fact it took me forever to download it, 4 days in total😫. Then I it had ask for my phone number and I happily obliged but it didn’t do what I thought it would🥺. I thought by giving my number I subscribed to gain free Cheetos and Cheeto merch. I was sorely mistaken🤧🤧🤧. By giving my number I started getting spammed with ways to turn into a Cheeto like Donald Trump👺. I was horrified!!!😤😤😤😤. Things in my house had now gained that Cheeto residue that you can never get off. My neighbors all became Cheeto president supporters😡😡😡😡. But the worse thing that happened is what happened to my stuff animals overnight they became MONSTERS!!! 🤪🤪🤪First they had all turned orange.🤨 They would run around the house like kids and try to runaway when things don’t go there way🤡. If they end up actually running away (because they’re too stupid to open a door) they would start saying racist, sexist, homophobic, and etc to anyone that qualify☺️☺️☺️. Then would try to steal children and try to do god knows what and the same with young women🧐😓(And come into my home like noting happened 🤬🤬🤬🤬). They also tried to kill me and touch me🤮 multiple times but I just don’t know why ✨💁🏾‍♀️💅🏾✨.Not to mention the army of pigs, Cheeto president supporters and Karens that spawned on my door step😃. negative ♾ / 0 don’t download.
